name: Harry is Hungry
description:
In a post-apocalyptic future...

The city is in flames...

People are running rampant across the streets...

And the glutton who started it all is now devouring the only thing they can depend on: candy.

This silly game was a Mini Jam 66 submission. The theme was Sweets and the limitation was to only use two button inputs. I began thinking about the game before the limitation was revealed, and I didn't want to start from scratch so I had to heavily accommodate, but I think it plays well even with two buttons. They are Left Shift and Space.

Instructions: Left Shift to change direction and Space to jump. Use Space to go through cutscenes if needed. When near a candy pile, hold Shift for 3 seconds without moving or jumping to eat it. Eat everything to win...
